mapper.insert: INSERT INTO learningGroup(id, contentId, userId, name, startDate, endDate, groupSize, etc1, etc2) VALUES(LEARNINGGROUP_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{userId}, #{GroupName}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{GroupSize}, #{GroupEtc1}, #{GroupEtc2})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM learninggroupmember a JOIN learninggroup b ON a.groupid = b.id join users c on a.userid = c.id WHERE a.groupid = #{id}
SELECT users.* FROM learningGroupMember lgm JOIN users ON lgm.userid = users.id WHERE lgm.groupId = #{groupId}

SELECT u.id, u.nickname, u.userType, u.name, lg.name as groupName FROM learningGroup lg JOIN learningGroupMember lgm ON lg.id = lgm.groupId JOIN users u ON lgm.userId = u.id WHERE lg.userId = #{educatorId}

SELECT lg.id, lg.contentId, lg.userId, lg.name, lg.startDate, lg.endDate, lg.groupSize, lg.etc1, lg.etc2, g.imageName, g.imagePath, u.name as userName FROM LearningGroup lg JOIN Users u ON lg.userId = u.id JOIN GameContents g ON lg.contentId = g.id ORDER BY lg.id desc
